summary.span: 管理控件的状态以及用于状态过渡的逻辑。

span.span: Manages states and the logic for transitioning between states for controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用，您可以指定控件的状态、控件在处于某种状态时的外观，以及控件更改状态的时间。The enables you to specify states for a control, the appearance of a control when it is in a certain state, and when a control changes states. 例如，当按下时，外观可能略有不同于未按下状态。For example, a might have a slightly different appearance when it is pressed than when it is not pressed. 定义的两个状态对应于按下（`"Pressed"`），而不是（`"Normal"`）。Two states that the defines correspond to when it is pressed (`"Pressed"`) and when it is not (`"Normal"`). 当控件处于状态时，该控件的外观由定义。The appearance of a control when it is in a state is defined by a . 包含对象的集合，这些对象指定控件在处于该状态时控件的外观如何变化。A contains a collection of objects that specify how the control's appearance changes when the control is in that state. 通过在控件上设置`VisualStateManager.VisualStateGroups`附加属性，可以向控件添加可视状态。You add visual states to a control by setting the `VisualStateManager.VisualStateGroups` attached property on the control. 每个都包含互斥的对象集合。Each contains a collection of objects that are mutually exclusive. 也就是说，控件始终处于每个中的一个状态。That is, the control is always in exactly one state of in each . 还允许您指定控件何时进入特定状态。The also enables you to specify when a control enters a specific state. 你应调用以更改状态的方法取决于你的方案。The method that you should call to change states depends on your scenario. 如果创建在其 中使用的控件，请调用方法。If you create a control that uses the in its , call the method. 有关如何创建使用的控件的详细信息，请参阅[创建具有可自定义外观的控件](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md)。For more information about how to create controls that use the , see [Creating a Control That Has a Customizable Appearance](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/creating-a-control-that-has-a-customizable-appearance.md). 如果在外使用（例如 ，如果在或单个元素中使用或），请调用方法。If you use the outside of a (for example, if you use a in a or in a single element), call the method. 在任一情况下， 都将执行适当地启动和停止与所涉及状态关联的情节提要所需的逻辑。In either case, the performs the logic that is required to appropriately start and stop the storyboards that are associated with the involved state. 例如，假设控件定义状态， `State1`并且`State2`每个都具有与之关联的情节提要。For example, suppose that a control defines the states, `State1` and `State2`, each of which has a storyboard associated with it. 如果控件`State1`在中，并且您传递`State2`到或，则会在`State2`中启动情节提要，并停止`State1`中的情节提要。If the control is in `State1` and you pass `State2` to or , the starts the storyboard in `State2` and stops the storyboard in `State1`. [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 附带 的控件用于更改可视状态。Controls that are included with [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] use the to change visual states. 为附带的控件创建时，可以将对象添加到控件的，以指定控件在特定状态下的外观。 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] When you create a for a control that is included with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], you can add objects to the control's to specify the control's appearance in a certain state. 若要查找附带[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]的控件的可视状态的名称，请参阅[控件样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-styles-and-templates.md)。To find the names of the visual states for the controls that are included with [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)], see [Control Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/control-styles-and-templates.md). 控件的逻辑处理状态之间的转换，因此您无需执行任何其他操作，只需在新中定义对象。The control's logic handles transitioning between states, so you do not need to do anything other than define the objects in the new . 有关如何为现有控件创建控件模板的详细信息，请参阅[通过创建 System.windows.controls.controltemplate> 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about how to create control templates for existing controls, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 如果要实现自己的逻辑以便在状态之间转换，则必须从继承， 重写方法，并在使用自定义逻辑的控件上设置附加属性。If you want to implement your own logic for transitioning between states, you must inherit from , override the method, and set the attached property on the control that uses the custom logic. ##
